EmailTemplate.name: MUFC #3
EmailTemplate.subject: Saves Thousands, Costs Nothing...
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
While your attending the 2014 MUFC, Please take a moment to stop by the WEX rapid! PayCard booth#526.
You'll learn how franchisees nationwide, are saving thousands of dollars a month, providing significant benefit to their managers and employees, truly at ZERO cost!!!
We hope you'll drop and say hello,
The WEX rapid! PayCard Team
